lead_paragraph: John Isner, Jack Sock and the Bryan twins will represent the United States against Australia in the first round of the Davis Cup next month.

headline.print_headline: Isner, Sock Picked for US Against Australia's Tomic, Kyrgios
headline.main: Isner, Sock Picked for US Against Australia's Tomic, Kyrgios

snippet: John Isner, Jack Sock and the Bryan twins will represent the United States against Australia in the first round of the Davis Cup next month....
